Actions.Name: Animate Junk Golem
Actions.Description: The Hoarder summons a Junk Golem in range 3.

Summons.Name: Junk Golem
Summons.Actions: When summoned, or once on the hoarder's turn, the golem can move 3 spaces, then shove an adjacent foe 2. If that foe collides, they take [D] damage and are shattered.
Summons.Effects: When the golem is defeated, drop 3 valuables in or adjacent to the space it occupied. When the golem passes over a valuables token, it absorbs it, gaining vigor 1 and giving its action bonus damage. It drops any tokens it picked up when it is defeated.

CustomComponents.Name: Greed
CustomComponents.Description: Deals bonus damage for each valuables token this character holds.

Actions.Name: Pile It Up
Actions.Description: The Hoarder creates a height 1 or 2 junk pile object in a space in range 6. Characters adjacent to it when it is created are shoved 1. If created under a character, it pushes them up on top of it instead.

Actions.Name: Junk Form
Actions.Description: The Hoarder transforms into junk, then swaps places with any free valuables token.
